knimeNode.name: Block Programmatically
knimeNode.shortDescription: Uses a lock to hold the execution until a prgrammatic "release" is triggered.

intro.p: This node is part of the workflow manager test framework. It's used to simulate a long processing job. It uses a java.util.concurrent.Lock object to stall. Using this node makes only sense if used in unit tests.

fullDescription.option: ID of the lock being used. Must be present in the global lock repository (i.e. programmatically added beforehand).
